segments.text: I like to open up a savings account please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: O . K . We offer a few different kinds .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want the one with the highest interest rate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be our Saver's Plus account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 4.5 % , that's good . How much money do I have to keep in it to get that rate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to maintain a balance of $ 10,000 in the account or the rate drops to 3 % .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I ’ ll open one of those .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just fill out these forms , and I ’ ll be with you in one second .
segments.speaker: S2
